name: NiteFall
description:
A LowRezJam (sort of roguelike?) exploration and creature-punching game made in DragonRuby GTK. Find your way to the 'goal' at the end of the woodland maze, fighting reproducing slimes, skeletons and inexplicably-red skeletons.

Controller support tested with Xbox One and DualShock 4.

Keys are WASD or cursors, together with Z/X/C or J/K/L.

Sadly there are currently some sprite glitches as I think I'm blowing the cache in DragonRuby GTK, but hopefully a fix will come eventually.
